transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Limbaaja energy se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Ji
Executive: Jai Prakash Jethi ji se?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Jai Prakash ji ek zaruri baat karni thi aapse main actually business manager baat kar raha hun Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ji sir dhanyavad aapko call karne ke liye sir.
Executive: Haan main dekh raha hun sir aapne ek concern raise kiya hua hai ki aapke jo account manager the purane Shivani ji aapko wo previous account manager chahiye.
Customer: Ji sir
Executive: Hai na to kyunki sir aapne shayad pehle bhi ye cheez raise kiya tha to isliye maine socha ek bar main connect karta hun samajhta hun kya dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Hai na kyunki aapka jo services chal raha hai sir hamare sath wo MDC services chal raha hai aapka.
Customer: Haan hai na aur hum to dekhiye sir anyways apne end se puri koshish karte hain ki aapke account manager jo hai wo same rahe.
Customer: Theek hai na
Executive: Aur halaki agar wo change hota hai to hum ye koshish karte hain ki agar aisa kuch hota bhi hai to hum puri tarike se usko compensate kare matlab aisa kuch issue na aaye hai na hamare usme.
Customer: Hmm
Executive: To overall agar main dekhunga sir to hamara bhi dekhiye ultimate goal yahi hai ki services ko kaise better kiya jaaye aur kaise jo bhi cheeze aisi ho rahi hai usko compensate kiya jaaye.
Customer: Hmm hmm
Executive: Hai na to support hamara pura rahega sir aisa nahi hai ki hum support nahi kar rahe hain aapko usme.
Customer: Aap wo Shivani madam gayi hai na uske baad ka graph dekho aapne kya kiya hai na wo theek hai aap mere ko mat sunaiye abhi.
Executive: Hmm hmm
Customer: Tab wo dusri madam thi na unko to maine suna hi diya hai aapko sunna hai to aadha ghanta aapko sunata hun main wapas.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekhiye jaisi baat hai aapko kahin na kahin dekh lijiye statistics dekh lijiye uske baad mere se baat kijiye aapko dena hai nahi dena hai wo aapka call hai aur mere ko yes ya no chahiye uske baad main resume karunga service ya nahi karunga uske wo mera call hai fir.
Customer: Aap de rahe ho to theek hai maine do shart rakhi thi Shivani madam de do otherwise five years ka experience wala person mere ko CV bhejo jo IndiaMART pe ho uske baad hi mere ko development mein ye manager chahiye otherwise mere ko nahi chahiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm
Customer: Mere ko uska CV chahiye main pass karunga to hi main workout karunga usme theek hai.
Executive: Nahi aapko agar waise sir aap keh rahe hain ki account manager aapka baat hi sunna chahiye sir mere ko aapka baat nahi sunna maine do shart rakhi hai theek hai aapko karna ho to kar sakte ho nahi karna ho to nahi karna dusra kaunsa aapne rakha dusra kaunsa rakha mere ko paanch saal ka experience wala IndiaMART wala banda chahiye jo IndiaMART pe hi ho pehle se.
Customer: Theek hai matlab account manager jo hai wo paanch saal experience hona chahiye na usko wo uska mere ko CV chahiye aur jo IndiaMART ka joining letter chahiye paanch saal pehle ka mere ko.
Customer: Main review karunga aur mere ko sahi lagega to hi aayega wo banda mere paas otherwise nahi aayega.
Executive: Sir wo to sir wo wo mera call hai kar sakte hain wo mera call hai na kyun nahi kar sakte 60 hazar de rahe hain to aapko le rahe hain IndiaMART wale to aapko bhi resume karte hi hai na dekhte hain wo ye round service wale to kaam nahi hai kuch hum bhi wo dekhenge apna kaam wo kaun banda sahi kar nahi kar raha ye to faltu mein ek ek saal fresher wale dal dete ho sirf.
Customer: MDC ko mazak bana ke rakha hai abhi aapki dedh lakh wali service shuru ho gayi ya nahi MDC ko mazak bana diya aapne to.
Executive: Sir hamare paas 65% base jo hai na IndiaMART pe wo MDC hi chala raha hai sir.
Customer: Haan to wo chalaiye sir sahi se hmm to aisa nahi hai ki humne MDC wale apne customers ko chhoda hua hai sir.
Executive: Sir pehle sir 95% tha 5% pehle wale the ye ye dheere dheere kam hote ja raha hai sir MDC aapke paas.
Executive: Wo to sir dekhiye market ka nahi dekhna sir abhi mere aapki baat nahi sunni hai aapke ho sakta hai to theek hai nahi ho sakta hai to koi baat nahi.
Executive: Achcha to ek last cheez bata dijiye sir main ek second aapko confirm kar raha hun.
Customer: Ji
Executive: Ek second mere ko open kar lene dijiye.
Customer: Sir main mere paas itna time nahi hai main kaam kar raha hun abhi theek hai.
Executive: Nahi mere ko bas ye confirm kar dijiye Shivani ji km dot Shivani ji thi na km Shivani aur Sundra ji unki manager thi wo aap unhi se baat wo.
Customer: Wo idea nahi hai
Executive: Haan haan main Shivani madam thi main meri ek hi account manager hai usko wapas lana hai nahi lana wo aapka call hai aapka nahi call hai theek hai wo aapke hisab se.
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Theek hai sir main ek bar check karke batata hun usko.
Customer: Ji sir okay thank you.
Executive:
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Shivani madam as account manager.

- Or, 5 years experienced IndiaMART employee.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with current MDC service.



Resolution:

- Executive assured full support and compensation.

- Executive will check and revert to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to check and inform the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, mdc, experience, cv, support
